title: Episode 26: Zeff and Sanji's Dream: The Illusory All Blue
author: One Man, One Piece
description: The podcast covers Zeff and Sanji's shocking past and asks what events brought them together and whether the gang can overcome Gin and the Invincible Pearl.

title: One Piece: Sanji's Tragic Backstory, Explained
author: Game Rant
description: An article explaining Sanji's backstory with Zeff, including their time stranded on the rocky island and Zeff's sacrifice.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Sanji's complete backstory including later revelations about his family

title: One Piece: Sanji's Past, Explained
author: Game Rant
description: A comprehensive look at Sanji's past including his time with Zeff and the formation of their bond through shared dreams.

title: One Piece: Why Baratie Arc is a Masterpiece
author: The Birds of Hermes
description: An analysis of why the Baratie arc, including Sanji's backstory episode, is considered one of the best early arcs in One Piece.

title: One Piece: Baratie Arc Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers
description: A comprehensive recap and review of the Baratie arc, highlighting the emotional impact of Sanji's backstory with Zeff.

title: Episode 26 Review: OnePiece Anime

description: A detailed review of Episode 26 focusing on the emotional depth of Sanji's backstory and Zeff's sacrifice.
